servinfo.title: Front Seat Heater Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped)

condition.ptxt: Both seat back and cushion do not become hot although seat heater switch is ON position

action.ptxt: Replace fuse to check for short.

ps.ptxt: Seat heater circuit in seat back and/or seat cushion faulty

action.ptxt: Replace heater front back and/or heater front cushion.

condition.ptxt: Only seat back does not become hot although seat heater switch is ON position

ps.ptxt: Seat heater circuit in seat back and/or seat cushion faulty

action.ptxt: Replace heater front back and/or heater front cushion.

condition.ptxt: Only seat cushion does not become hot although seat heater switch is ON position

ps.ptxt: Seat heater circuit in seat cushion
